body_html: This is a problem with avx512. I'm currently working on this in context of SLEEF as well. We shouldn't look at compiler support for avx512 until we have code that'll actually benefit from this. This should be resolved together with the PR that pulls in SLEEF.
body_text: This is a problem with avx512. I'm currently working on this in context of SLEEF as well. We shouldn't look at compiler support for avx512 until we have code that'll actually benefit from this. This should be resolved together with the PR that pulls in SLEEF.
body: This is a problem with avx512. I'm currently working on this in context of SLEEF as well. We shouldn't look at compiler support for avx512 until we have code that'll actually benefit from this. This should be resolved together with [the PR that pulls in SLEEF](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/6725).
